274b5(mdo 'grel): bam kha dog sna tshogs pas glegs bam bcings par gyur pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i 'thob pa rab tu thob nas dad pas khyim spangs te/
274b6(mdo 'grel): skra dang kha spu brags nas chos gos bgos te khyim nas khyim med par 'dus pa gnyis pa la rab tu byung te/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag ni re zhig chos la dge ba'i
274b7(mdo 'grel): rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no/ /'di ltar 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag yin te/ dge 'dun la dge pa'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang/ skyed du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar 'di dge 'dun spyan 'dren pa sgrags pa dang/ dge ba la 'dzud pa dang/ brgyad
275a1(mdo 'grel): ston byed pa dang/ gso sbyong byed pa dang/ rab tu 'gron tu 'bod pa dang/ dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol ba dang/ spyan 'dren pa dang/ glo bur du spyan 'dren pa dang/ zla ston byed pa dang/ stag res skor byed pa dang/ chos sgrogs
275a2(mdo 'grel): pa spyan 'dren pa dang/ lo lnga ston byed pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dbul ba dang/ mal stan 'dings pa dang/ chos gos 'bul ba dang/ gtsug lag khang gsar pa'i rab gnas byed pa dang/ sman 'bul ba dang/ yo byad 'bul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyad pa
275a3(mdo 'grel): de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi'i 'thob pa rab tu thob nas 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos bgos te/ yang dag pa'i khyim nas khyim med par rab
275a4(mdo 'grel): tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag ni re zhig dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no/ /de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par rgya cher bshad nas/ shing tA la
275a5(mdo 'grel): bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas dge 'dun de dag gi mdun du cho 'phrul ya ma zung sna tshogs bstan te/ steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas tshe'i 'du byed dang srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas dge slong de dag gis
275a6(mdo 'grel): gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la lus bsregs nas mchod rten byas te/ dri dang/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams kyis mchod par byas so/ /rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par
275a7(mdo 'grel): brgyud nas bshad do/ /nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam nas dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir rtogs pa brjod pa 'di 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes
275b1(mdo 'grel): gnyen gyis bshad do// //'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a dze ta sh+ri b+ha tra dang/ dge slong shAkya 'od? kyis bsgyur// //gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs brjod gsang ba byin
275b2(mdo 'grel): gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa b+ha ku mA rI kA ba dA naM/ bod skad du/ gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chags bral ldan dang legs par bshad pa dang/ /ngo mtshar dang ni de nyid don nges dang/ /dam pa
275b3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi gcig tu mnyan bya yi/ /rtogs pa brjod pa bdag gis bshad kyis nyon/ /'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la ni longs spyod chen po'am/ /lang chos bar du gcod par mi 'gyur bas mdzes par gyur pa yin no/ /de yang 'di ltar rjes su
275b4(mdo 'grel): thos te/ rgyal po kri ki zhes bya ba tshul dang dul ba la sogs pa yon tan gyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs la dad pa yang dag par thob pa zhig byung bar gyur pa de/ de'i bu mo bdun
275b5(mdo 'grel): sngon du byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cher bskrun pa'i stobs dang ldan pa de dag 'khor bas shin tu yid byung bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis dul ba dang zhes sar bcas pas pha la phyag byas te snyan pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ 'jig
275b6(mdo 'grel): rten gnas pa chu nang song ba'i zla ba'i gzugs bzhin g.yo bar mthong/ /'dod pa khros pa'i sprul gyis lus skyil gdengs ka'i grib ma lta bur mthong/ /'gro ba 'di dag sdug bsngal me yis kun tu 'bar ba mthong bas na/ /rgyal po bdag cag nges
275b7(mdo 'grel): par 'byung la mngon dga' dur khrod dag tu mchi/ rgyal pas smras pa/ khyed ni byis pa bde la bsten 'os shing/ /yid la bsams pa'i don yang ma byas na/ /dka' thub gnas su khyed rnams song zhig ces/ /ji lta bur nang yis smra bar nus/ /bu mos
276a1(mdo 'grel): smras pa/ sa bdag khyed kyi mdza' spyod bdag cag rnams kyis 'tshal lags te/ /'gro la thugs rje brlan cing des pa'i ngang tshul ldan pas na/ /dgos pa med la 'ang byams par mdzad na nyid kyi phang par ni/ /rnam bskyed
276a2(mdo 'grel): sdig med nyer so na bdag cag rnams lta smos ci 'tshal/ /khyed dang lhan cig gnas kyang dbang med bral ba mngon phyogs pa'i/ /phongs pa 'di yis phyir zhing nye bar gdung bar ma gyur ces/ /rgyal po shin tu dga' ba'i gnas su gyur
276a3(mdo 'grel): pa gang dag yin pa yi/ /zhi ba'i go 'phang thob par 'tshal ba'i yid ni skyes par gyur/ /de nas rgyal po de snying brtse ba'i dbang gis yid rnam par nyams shing/ mig gnyis zangs ltar dmar la mi 'gyur bas yang dang yang du bltas
276a4(mdo 'grel): nas smras pa/ ci phyir khang bzangs rang dgar gyur dang 'jam yangs pa'i/ /sna tshogs stan bzangs rgya chan rnam par spangs nas ni/ /dur khrod mi bzad skye bo ngan pa'i yid 'dra zhing/ /sa gzhi rus pa dkar po'i tshal pas bkram par
276a5(mdo 'grel): brton/ /gdung ba'i gdong can ba dang yul rmugs lta bur ni/ /mchi ma'i gdong can ma yang cig car ji ltar 'dor/ /g.yo med sems kyi rgyun du yid ni brtsa ba yi/ /mdza' shes spangs nas ci phyir dka' thub ston par dga' / /de nas bu
276a6(mdo 'grel): mo de rnams kyis shin tu brtan pa'i yid kyis bsnyems par byas nas smras pa/ pha dang ma dang mdza' bshes gces pa tha snyad tsam/ /'di dag srid par phyir yang ltung dang gnod pa'i gzhi/ /'byung ba'i don mthong lkog tu gyur pa'i dri ma
276a7(mdo 'grel): yis/ /mi yis bdag po 'jig rten 'jig pas yongs su skyo/ /mdza' bshes rang mi gnyen gyi ngo bo sna tshogs pa/ g.yon can phung khros ldan pa 'di la su zhig chags/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rmi lam mig 'khrul dang 'dra la/ /'di
276b1(mdo 'grel): na su zhig gang gis rang mi 'am skye bor brtag /mi yi dbang po 'jig rten dam chos gsung gi 'od zer snang bcas shing/ /ji srid sangs rgyas nyi ma'i yid 'ong grags pas 'od zer phreng yod pa/ /de srid phongs pa'i mun nag tshogs kyis shin tu
276b2(mdo 'grel): g.yogs gyur pa'i/ /srid pa'i mun pa mi zad mun rum nas ni 'byung bar bya ba'i rigs/ /ji ltar rlung gis brdabs pas bskyod pa'i me lce 'bar ba'i khyim las ni/ /'byung bar byed pa'i skyes bu de la phan par 'dod rnams zlog mi byed/ /de bzhin
276b3(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal me chen rtser gnas srid pa ma lus gnod pa yis/ /dra ba las ni nges par 'byung la phan phyir dam pas zlog mi bya/ /de nas rgyal po des bu mo de rnams mdza' bshas dang rang mi dang rtsa lag rnams la bltos pa med pa'i tshig
276b4(mdo 'grel): rtsub po dang/ rang gi lus dang srog la yang shin tu ma chags pa'i tshig gis lhag par yang mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur pa'i yid kyis de rnams la yang smras pa/ dus min dka' thub mngon par 'dod pa ni/ /yid dang rjes mthun don du mi
276b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ /bu mo dus min mngal dang ldan pa la/ /yan lag cha shas mdzes pa mi skye bzhin/ /dus la bab par dka' thub la sbyor ba/ /zla ba skyon dang bral ba lta bur mdzes/ /de bas gzhon nus phan med blo 'gyur 'di'i/ /lag pa'i lam du
276b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug las bzlog par gyis/ /bde la brten cing sdug bsngal ma mthong bas/ /lus kyis sdug bsngal bzod par mi 'gyur te/ /a mra'i shing ni rtsa ba ma zug la/ /glang chen mchog gi mche ba bsnun dang mtshungs/ /kheng nas me 'bar ltas
276b7(mdo 'grel): ngan sgra 'byin pa'i/ /lce spyang 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs tshang tshing gang/ /'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed pa yi/ /mi bzad dur khrod dag ni 'jigs par bcas/ /khyed lus pad+ma'i rtsa ltar 'jam pa la/ /sems gang sog les lta bur brtse 
277a1(mdo 'grel): med 'dis/ /gzhan gyi ngor byed pa ni spong gyur pa/ /e ma ho gnam skos bdag la brtse med sdang/ /bai DUrya ltar sngo ljang rung pa'i gos gyon cing/ /me tog rnam pa du ma 'chogs? ni bkram gyur dang/ bung ba myos pa'i tshogs kyis
277a2(mdo 'grel): khyab pa'i rtsed mo'i tshal/ /'di ni bu mo khyed rnams mngon par dga' bar gyis/ /skyed mos tshal na rdzing khang dogs na me tog shing 'phyang shing/ /rlung gi chu rlabs mdzes pa'i breng bas ska rags bcings/ /pad+ma dag dang utpal rgyas gseb
277a3(mdo 'grel): dang ba sgra sgrogs pa/ /brgya byin gyis kyang rnyed dka' bu mo dga' bas gnas par gyis/ /me tog na pa ma li ka'i dris bskos gyur pa yi/ /chu rlabs mdzes par gyur pa'i nye bar g.yo ba yi/ /rlung dang bcas pa'i khyim 'di dang ni nags tshal
277a4(mdo 'grel): ni/ /khu byugs sgra 'byin pa yi bu mo dga' bar gyis/ /skar khung dra ba can nang bya rnams skad 'byin me tog dris bsgos dang/ /sgegs pas khrus byas dri zhim bsgam pa'i nags dang 'dra ba'i rlung dag ni/ /khang bzangs mda' yab can dang bya
277a5(mdo 'grel): gag bde bar nyal ba gang yin 'dir/ /bud med 'dus pa'i glu dbyangs rol mo ldan par khyed rnams dga' bar gyis/ /de nas gzhon nu ma de rnams pha'i tshig des yi dam rangs par gyur nas smras pa/ /mi'i bdag po lha yul sa steng na/
277a6(mdo 'grel): brgya phrag stong du spyad pa ma byas pa'i/ /bde ba gzhan ngag ci yang yod min te/ /bdag cag rnams ni don med mkhas pa yin/ /yul la lhags par sred cing goms pas na/ /dbang po rnams ni yul gyis doms pa med/ /srid
277a7(mdo 'grel): pas 'jigs pa'i rtag par blo can dag /srid pa'i longs spyod zad par bya phyir 'jug/ ngo bo nyid kyis 'gyur zhing mi brtan la/ /rlung gis bskyed pa'i chu rlabs ltar 'jigs pas/ /sdom can dbang po drug las rnam rgyal rnams/ /phyir
277b1(mdo 'grel): zhing srid par 'jug las ldog par byed/ /byis pa srid pa'i btson rar phag lta bur/ /sems kyi spags pa'i spyod pas bslus gyur te/ /bde bar mngon par rlom zhing brkam ba dag/ 'phongs shing 'jigs pa'i g.yangs mdza' med lhung/ /bdag tu
277b2(mdo 'grel): rtog pas sems g.yengs skyes gyur pa/ de ni rab 'bar mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor 'dra/ /yul la rjes su brten pas sems bcom pa/ /yongs su smin na sdug bsngal mi bzang rgyu/ /'gro ba 'di dag mi brtan dbang med cing/ /sprul gdug
277b3(mdo 'grel): mtshon gyis zin 'dra'i yul rnams dag/ rtogs kyang gang zhig srid la chags gyur pa/ /de ni mi yi gzugs ldan phyugs nyid yin/ /rnga rtsid shing la thogs pa'i g.yag bzhin du/ /blo'i lam ni rnyog pas nyed 'gags shing/ /log par
277b4(mdo 'grel): chags pa'i yal gas sems thogs pa'i/ /skyes bu ngan pa'i khyim bsten pur bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i rgyu tsam 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten la/ /phongs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung 'gyur na/ /yab cig srid pa'i dga' ba mang po las/ /skra bar mi
277b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gang zhig mchis par gsungs/ /mi dbang srid na bskal pa mnyam pa yis/ /nye bar bsgrubs shing bsags par gyur kyang ni/ /bcom zhing sems ni dman pa dman pa yis/ /srid pa'i dgon pa gzhan du 'go bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po
277b6(mdo 'grel): rgyar chud gyur pa'i nya bzhin du/ /skyes bu legs par brtags shing byed pa dang/ /tha snyad kun la dang gis mkhas pa yang/ /khyim gyi brtson dar gnas na 'jigs par 'gyur/ /sI bdag po 'bad pa mang po yis/ /khyim du rdzas rnams bsags
277b7(mdo 'grel): pa byas pa dag/ /mi yis skad cig gis ni 'dor 'gyur to/ /legs bshad gcig pu 'di nyid lam du bstan/ /de bas 'jig rten mgon pos 'tsho ba yi/ /'jig rten ma rnams las bdag byar gsungs te/ /'chi ba mngon phyogs mi la rang gi
278a1(mdo 'grel): las/ /ba la be'u bzhin du rjes su 'brangs/ /yongs su gyur na mi bzad gnyen sdug dang/ /sdug dang 'dre bar mngon pas 'dod des chog/ sdug dang phrad pas dga' bar sems pa dag/ nges par sdug dang bral ba'i sdug
278a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal 'thob/ /mi dbang gzhan yang dang gis mthar 'jig pa'i/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten dag na sdug pa su/ /dam pa'i don la rnam dpyod mkhas pa yang/ /sdug ces bya ba 'di blo rnam par g.yengs/ /sa bdag khyed ni gal te bdag cag
278a3(mdo 'grel): la/ /sdug pa 'ga' zhig mchis na bdag cag rnams/ /ma smad 'phags pas bsten cing mi phrogs pa'i/ /bde ba yid la 'dod pa sgrub tu gsol/ /de nas rgyal po de brtse ba'i yid ma rangs par gyur kyang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan
278a4(mdo 'grel): pa la mngon par dad pas chos la bar chad byed pa'i 'jigs pa skyes pa dang/ rang gi bu mo rnams kyis sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran te 'gro bar 'dod pas na skye ba dran pas nyes so snyam du bsams te/ shin tu yun ring por cang mi smra
278a5(mdo 'grel): bar gyur to/ /mi yi skyes bu de yis ni/ /'ching ba med par shes pas na/ /song bas yongs su ma spangs par/ /ci zhig ltar ni rjes snang smras/ /de nas bu mo de rnams kyis me tog phreng ba dang byug pa dang rgyan rnams spangs nas/ dul ba
278a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par zhugs pa'i lus la gos dkar po phra zhing rab tu 'phyang ba gyon bas chu bo rlung gi shugs kyis bskyed pa'i dbu ba'i phreng ba lta bu 'am/ ston ka'i mtshan mo zla ba'i 'od kyi gos kyis bkab pa lta bu 'am/ drang srong smre bdun
278a7(mdo 'grel): gyi skar ma rang gi 'od zer gyi dra bas g.yogs ba lta bu dang/ rim gyis ro bsregs pa'i gnas me'i dbus su ro bzhag pa cil cil zer ba rnam par bkram pa dang/ ro rnam par gnam pa dri mi zhim cing 'jigs su rung ba dang/ mi'i
278b1(mdo 'grel): thong? ba bya rgod kyi mchu'i rtse mo rnon pos brtol ba'i bu ga nas glad pa dang chu ser rnam par 'jig pas mi ro'i gdong la spags pas mdza' ma gyab cing 'jigs pa dang/ rnyings shing dengs la mdogs rnam par 'gyur ba'i rus pa dum bu'i tshogs kyis
278b2(mdo 'grel): nan cing rtsub pas sa'i phyogs rnams bgrang par dka' ba dang/ lus can dag yongs su yid 'byung bar byed ba gshin rje'i gnas bzhin mya ngan dang yid mi bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i dur khrod du phyin bar gyur to/ /de la
278b3(mdo 'grel): 'di skad ces bya ste/ mi'i khrag dag zhag gas dri mi zhim pas myos par gyur pa'i bya rgod dang/ rgyu lto nar bas khyab cing mi sdug 'jigs pa'i ro yi yan lag rnams kyis khebs/ kun da 'dra bar dkar zhing rtag tu dgod pa 'dra bar mdza' gas
278b4(mdo 'grel): thod pa dang/ n+ya gro d+ha rnying sul nas 'ug pa sna tshogs hUM sgrogs 'jigs pa'i dur khrod phyin/ /lce spyang kha ni mer bcas brlang ba'i sgra dag sgrogs pas 'jigs pa dang/ /la lar thod pa dkar po'i dra bas khyab cing bgrod dka' dang/ /srin bu
278b5(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi tshogs kyis gzings shing rna khung bskyod pa dang/ /bung ba sgrang bu brgya phrag mang po ro la 'phungs shing 'du/ /rus pa dkar dang dmar rlon rlung gis bskyed par gyur pa dang/ /ro sregs me gsal 'phro dang shing skam rtsa na sprul nyal
278b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ /la lar mi yi lus ni mdung rnos phug nas bskyon pa dag/ gshin rje rtag tu dga' ston byed la 'jug pa'i tshang bar? 'dra/ /la lar mi mgo'i thod pa'i gseb nas khrag dang chu ser 'dzag pa yi/ /khu ba mi sdug dag la sred pa'i
278b7(mdo 'grel): sha za'i tshogs kyis khyag/ la lar ci la cil zer ba'i ro bseg me yis bskor ba dang/ mi ro'i khong nas rgyu long phyung ba gtor bas khyab par gyar/ /skye bas brlan pa'i sems kyis ni/ /der ni bud med der brtags nas/ /'tsho ba'i
279a1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten rgyu mi rgyu'i/ /ngo bo nyid ni sems par gyur/ /skra yi snying ni sdul gyis rtsub cing dmar/ /mig sbubs bya yi mchu dang sder mos brus/ /gsang gnas 'gyur zhing mi sdug rnag bcas par/ /bor ba'i bud
279a2(mdo 'grel): med lus der rab tu bltas/ /dam pa'i spyod pa thang cig nyer g.yos shing/ /utpal 'deb ltar dkyus ring mig gis ni/ /ro yi gzeb de mngon par bltas nas kyang/ /tshig mang rnam pa du ma smras par gyur/ /'di nyid rdo thal
279a3(mdo 'grel): byugs pas dga' ba'i gnas khang ni/ /zla zer gsal bas spras par byas pa ru/ /sdug pa'i phangs par brtan cing gnas pa las/ /de ni sa'i dkyil 'khor gzhi la nyal/ /sdug pa'i lag pa'i gzeb tu nyal ba na/ /'brug
279a4(mdo 'grel): sgra sgrogs pa yis ni khyod skrag na/ /mer bcas ltas ngan lce sbyang sgra yis ni/ /dka' thub ma khyod ci phyir 'dir mi 'jigs/ /'di nyid rang gi khyim 'khor zla zer de/ /ro smad lci ba'i khur gyis dal 'gro la/ /rol cing dgod la sgeg par
279a5(mdo 'grel): rnam lta la/ /brtse med bya rnams da ltar za bar byed/ /'gro ba 'di dag ngan cing mi brtan te/ /snying rje med pa'i sdug de ci yi phyir/ /mi ro brgya yis khyab par gyur pa yi/ /dur khrod 'di ru khyod ni bor par 'gyur/ /rang mi rtsa lag mdza' bshes
279a6(mdo 'grel): sdug pa dang/ pad+ma ? bung ba bzhin du gnas pa las/ /ci phyir mtshan mos rgyu bas 'jigs kyang ni/ /nyon mongs deng 'dir dur khrod dag tu dga' / /sngon ni mdzes shing snum la dkyus ring 'jam pa'i mig gi lto ba na/ /chags can rnams kyis mig
279a7(mdo 'grel): 'bras mdza' dmar 'gyur zhing mi rnams nyams byed pa/ /'dod lha'i ri dags rgyar gyur bud med de nyid deng ni bya rnams kyis/ /mig phyung sdug bsngal byas pas chags dang bcas rnams shin tu 'jigs par byed/ /mi gtsang sna tshogs
279b1(mdo 'grel): khong na mi mngon srog shing gi/ lus la bdag gir chags pas? longs pa'i mi bglus? zhes/ /bud med mchog 'di 'dod chags ldan pa rnams la ni/ /ba rkam pa'i bya yis mchu? gtog sa gdong gis nye bar dgod/ /pi wang gling bu'i sgra snyan rnams dang snyan
279b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i glu gar bcas/ /mchog tu sdug pa'i phang na bag phab bde bar gnyid log pa'i/ /bud med de ni lci spyang skad 'byin mu cor sgra bcas shing/ /sa rdul gyis khyab rtsub pa'i dur khrod 'dir deng nyal bar gyur/ /gang du rnam par brtags kyang skra'i rtse mo tsam gyis
279b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gtsang ba mi gtsang tshogs kyis tshang 'dir mi snang na/ /phung khrol chos can nad mang 'dod pa tha chad pa/ /rang bzhin ngan rnams ci phyir de ni chags par gyur/ /bu mo 'gro ba kun gyi tshul yang 'di 'dra bas/ /rmi lam mig 'phrul chu zla lta bur rang bzhin gyis/ /g.yo
279b4(mdo 'grel): ba brtogs pa ji srid srog ni lhag ma dang/ /bcas shing lus bzhin gyur tshe chags dang nyer bral byos/ /gshin rje'i chu rin dga' ba'i khar ni chung gyur cing/ /skra dkar tshogs kyi spyi nas bzung nas ni/ /srog mthar gyur pa'i gnod pa'i tshor ma'i gnad phug la/ /mchi
279b5(mdo 'grel): mas mig khebs gyur tshe dge ba ji ltar bya/ /'jig rten pha rol mi bzang mun nag g.yang chen du/ /lhung zhing lus byed gyur tshe dge ba 'dod gyur pa/ /dug can sbrul kha dog pa'i nang du chud gyur pa'i/ /sbal pa nga ro 'don dang mtshungs zhes mkhas rnams smra/ /ci phyir
279b6(mdo 'grel): tshig rtsub phra ma ma 'brel spyi brtol smra ba dang/ /snyan tshig bcos sam 'jig rten bslus par gyur nas de ring ni/ /mi smra gnas zhes spyod pa lta bus mdun so'i phrag nas ni/ /bya rnams tsham tshom med par mchu'i skams pas lce yang 'byin par 'gyur/ /chags
279b7(mdo 'grel): pas mdong shing logs pa'i yul goms yon po'i bsam pa can/ /byis pa gang gis mig gis yul mthong brtan pa rnam 'jig pa'i/ /mdzes pa'i ro smad de ni de ring 'jigs dang bral ba yi/ /mi bzang bya rgod mchu dang sder mor 'jog cing tshul du 'dri//
280a1(mdo 'grel): gang dag rang gi khang pa sa gzhi me tog sil mas gtor ba yi/ /rtsig pa'i ri mo yongs 'gyur bzhin dang zur gyis lta byed cing/ /sdug pa'i lag pa'i pad+mar rten cing dal gyis 'gro ba yis/ /bud med de'i rkang pa deng ni wa dag?
280a2(mdo 'grel): za bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar lhan cig skyes pa'i mi sdug mi gtsang 'dam rdzab dang/ /dregs pas myos shing sems lhung gyur pas sdug bsngal nyon mongs pa'i/ /lus la khyod kyis 'di ni rang bzhin ma zhir bltas nas ni/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten glog
280a3(mdo 'grel): ltar rab tu 'jig la'ang yid byung gis/ /yang ngag ji bzhin thugs chud chos kyi rgyal pos sems can rnams/ /nyon mongs rma snang rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag par gdung ba la/ /rang bzhin bsil ba'i chos gsung chu yi bum pas tshim
280a4(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i mchog gyur ston pa de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes par dka' zhing g.yon can ma zhig las dang nyon mongs ldan/ /rnam par 'gyur lam zhi skye bar bshad pa gang yin pas/ /rmongs pa shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du dbang
280a5(mdo 'grel): med 'khor/ /'jig rten mi bzod 'phangs pa'i rdo rjes lus ni nges 'joms 'gyur/ /gzhon nu'i tshan ma yis lan bur ldan pa'i skra byas shing/ /gang la yang tshom des pa'i nor bu'i sreng pa mchog bcings dang/ /bram ze me tog bcas? pa'i
280a6(mdo 'grel): shi pa'i chu thigs kyis gtor ba'i/ /bud med mgo la mi bzang kha? rnams thogs pa ma nyon mongs so/ /gang zhig bag ma'i dus su me tog bzang bsgos shing/ /ma yi lag pas dge mtshan bkra shis byas gyur pa'i/ /skra de di ring rab
280b1(mdo 'grel): e ma sgyu ma'i gsang ba'i ra ba bkod ngo mtshar cha/ /dgong cing ngal gyis rnam g.yo'i rna rgyan 'od kyis 'khur ba dmar po dang/ /gang du srog dang mnyam pa'i mdzes pa'i ri mo 'bad de bris pa dang/ pad+ma gzhon nu'i snying po lta bu 'jam pa'i 'khur chos?
280b2(mdo 'grel): gang yin der/ /bya rnams dpral bar gnas shing khrag gis spags pa'i mchu yis 'chog par byed/ /'od can mu tig phreng ba'i lbu ba dkar zhing ba spu'i chu bal can/ /nu ma rgyas pa'i dur ba zur ldan brang gi rdzi mchog yangs pa dag/ g.yo ba'i gos
280b3(mdo 'grel): lhung byas pas phongs pa'i mig ni gang du chags gyur pa/ /der ni rnam par snags pas sbrang bu'i tshogs rnams 'phungs par gyur/ /sngon ni tsandan chu thigs phreng gtor tA la'i lo ma rlung yab dang/ /mdag gzhug rnams dang bzang mo'i gdu bu'i sgrar
280b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa dag g.yog byed cing/ /khang bzangs zla zer gyis sbras dkar bas mdzes pa'i sngas ni rten gyur pa/ /de ni deng 'dir khra'i sgro bshog rtsub pas bskyong pa'i rlung gis g.yob par gyur/ /gang gis sngon ni 'di bskyod cing/ /gseb nad? dag tu gnas
280b5(mdo 'grel): bcas nas/ /lus kyi shing ni spangs nas ni/ /sems kyi spre'u de gang du song/ /gang gis byed pa med 'di yang/ /byed pa lta bur ston byed pa/ /bdag med do 'di spangs nas su/ /sems kyi bzhad gad? mkhan gang song/ /gang zhig rmongs pas blo mdongs pas/ /
280b6(mdo 'grel): ngang na bdag tu 'dogs gyur cing/ /mu stegs can rnams rmongs byed pa'i/ /rnam shes srin po de gang song/ /gang gis yun ring rnam rmongs kyang/ /yang dag par ni mi gnas pas/ /sna tshogs sems kyis sgyu ma mkhan/ /'gro ba 'di las gang du song/ /
280b7(mdo 'grel): bdag gi 'gro ba ser skya sogs/ /dka' thub pas kyang mi shes pas/ /nam mkha' i yul gyi spyod yul can/ /sems kyi rig 'dzin de gang song/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo'i sgo dgu po/ /mi gtsang 'di ni spyod spyod pa/ /de nas lus kyi gzeb 'di las/ /sems
281a1(mdo 'grel): kyi bya de gang du song/ /mi bzang bul las sdug bsngal 'bab pa'i lan tsha chen pos rab tu khengs gar pa'i/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho nyon mongs sprul dang nyar 'gre gang yin der chud cing/ /mi shes chu srin 'khrug pa'i chu rlabs g.yo/
281a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i chu bor nub gyur pa/ /sems kyi mtshan mo spyod pa lus 'di spangs nas de ring gang du song/ /nye bral bcom ldan de ni gdul ba'i thabs rnams gang dag yin mkhyen gyi/ /ma dul gang gis mthar ni dmyal bar me 'bar 'phro bar gyur pa yi/ /
281a3(mdo 'grel): gser ltar ser ba'i gseb du dbang med par ni 'dor byed pa/ /rang bzhin g.yo bar byed pa'i sems kyi rta de di ring gang du song/ /de nas rdo rje'i 'od kyis 'khrig ma rgyas ljang ba/ /brgya byin dga' bas mig gdangs dul bcas nyer song ste/ /bu
281a4(mdo 'grel): mo rnams la rang bzhin skal bzang tshig gis ni/ /rjes su mthun zhing dge bas legs so legs zhes smras/ /sring mo na tshod gzhon zhing 'dod lha'i gnas gyur dang/ /rgyal rigs 'byor ba'i dpal gyis bde ba spangs nas ni/ /sngon gyi drang srong
281a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi dka' la zhugs gyur pa/ /dka' thub 'dis bdag yongs dga' khyed rnams ci 'dod smros/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug lag mthil gnas bzhin shes par gyis/ /sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po'i bde ba yang des rtogs la/ /lha rgyal
281a6(mdo 'grel): brgya byin bdag yin khyed nyid gang 'dod dang/ /sring mo bdag gis nges par gang bya myur du smros/ /de nas gzhon nu de rnams yul gyi bde la 'dod med cing/ /rang bzhin g.yo med sems kyis brgya byin zur mig gis bltas nas/ /rang gi
281a7(mdo 'grel): dge ba yongs su smin pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /kha na ma tho med gsal sna tshogs don ldan tshig 'di smras/ /brgya byin bdag cag skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni gdungs gyur pa'i/ /srid pa'i bde ba'i zil pa'i kha chu 'dzags pa'i rgyu
281b1(mdo 'grel): 'dra'i phyir/ /gzhin ras mdzes pa mya ngan mchi mas bris shing rnyog pa yi/ /gnyen rnams spangs nas dka' thub 'di la rjes su zhugs pa yin/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus tshul ngan gyis bcings mi bzad pa/ /'phongs pa brgya phrag stong gis
281b2(mdo 'grel): bcom pas nges par skyo gyur pas/ /bkren pas nyams thag mthong bas nyes zad rnams kyis rjes 'brangs te/ /rga med mya ngan med pa'i go 'phang thob phyir brtson pa yin/ /gal te 'gro la rjes brtse lhag bsam ngang tshul ldan gyur cing/ /ci ste
281b3(mdo 'grel): brgya byin khrod kyis mchog ni yang dag ster nus na/ /'chi med mi phrogs tshangs zhi tshangs pa'i go 'phangs rnam grol te/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pas yongs gdung bdag cag rnams kyis thob par mdzod/ /lus las byung zhing 'dzag pa'i dri ma skyon gyis
281b4(mdo 'grel): bsgos par gnas pa dang/ /ma'i mngal du mi gtsang 'dam gyi tshogs na yang ma spangs spyod/ /byung na rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi ni mgo brtsir brgyal zhing nyams thag pas/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i skye ba bcad par
281b5(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /rga ba'i srin mos skra dkar mche ba dkar po myu gu ldan pa yi/ /kha gdangs nas ni 'gro la gzhung lugs med par spyi nas 'dzin byed cing/ /gang 'di mi yi brtson dran blo gros dga' pa'i dpal ni rab 'dzoms pa/ /lha'i dbang po khyod kyis
281b6(mdo 'grel): gal te nus na de las bskyab par mdzod/ /dbugs rgod g.yo zhing lto ba sra la pags pa skya zhing rtsub pa dang/ /longs spyod 'bar ba sna tshogs thob kyang spyod par mi nus stobs med pa/ /gang gis lus zin 'chi bdag pho nya'i skyes bu nad tshogs rab
281b7(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa/ /lha dbang khyod ni ci ste mchog sbyin 'dod na de las bdag cag skyobs/ /mig ni phyir phyogs gyur mi g.yo nad rnams gcod pas sdug bsngal ba/ /nyon mongs 'khrul pas rab tu lus bcom 'jigs pas phung po 'gyel ba dang/
282a1(mdo 'grel): gnyen rnams mthong bas mchi mas 'khur ba dag dang mchu ni bkrus gyur pa/ /gang gis zin na rab tu 'jigs 'gyur cing ba de las bdag cag srungs/ /gang gis yid khyab gyur na phyugs bzhin 'gyur zhing mya ngan gyis
282a2(mdo 'grel): zin la/ /bya dang mi bya'i rnam pa blo la mi sems smad pa'i gnang bskyed pa/ /tha mal bsil ba'i 'thor ba'i rlung gis g.yabs kyang lus tshim mi 'gyur pa'i/ /'dod chags me chen de ni mchog sbyin khyod kyis nges par zhi bar mdzod/ /gang
282a3(mdo 'grel): gi shugs kyis mig 'gyur g.yo zhing so'i sgro gnon la/ /skad cig gis kyang mi bzad dmyal ba'i 'bras bu ster byed sdig can ni/ /dengs pa'i lo ma dang ni chu dag za ba'i thub rnams kyis kyang ma bton pa'i/ /yid kyi sul gnas khro ba'i sprul de brgya
282a4(mdo 'grel): byin khyod kyis bsal bar mdzod/ /gang gis mig khebs gyur na blo gros ngan rnams zhi pa'i lam spong zhing/ /log lta'i dug gis nye bar spags pa'i yid kyis lam gzhan dag la brten/ /gang zhig rab rib bsal bas zag pa kun gyi rgyur
282a5(mdo 'grel): ni rab gsungs pa/ /log yid khyim na spyod pa rmongs pa'i mun pa'i mun nag brgya byin khyod kyis gsol/ /brgya byin mchog ni de dag rnams/ /khyod la bdag cag rnams slong gis/ /dam bcas don las 'gal ba ni/ /mkhas pas 'dor
282a6(mdo 'grel): par mi byed do/ /de nas brgya byin gyis de rnams 'dod pa'i yul dag slong par mi byed cing/ ltos pa med la gsal zhing mdzes pa'i tshig gis rnam par 'phrul pas ngo mtshar du gyur cing yang dag par dad pas lus kyi spu zing zhes byed de/ smras
282a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ mi 'byor dngos po slong bar gyur pa ni/ /'jig rten dag na bra zhing zhum gyur pas/ /gang 'di bdag gis sbyin par nus pa yi/ /mchog rnams sbyin gyis bu mo khyed kyis smros/ /de nas bu mo de rnams kyis de'i nang na mngon pa'i rgyus rnam par
282b1(mdo 'grel): smras pa'i tshig des yang dag par skyo bas nye bar bskyed pa'i khro bas brgya byin la smras pa/ /ci phyir nye bar 'drid pa'i thabs dang ni/ /brgya byin mdzem med de dag gang du lhags/ /bde btsom dang mi mkhas blo can nam/ /mi bsrun pa'i bgrong bya bdag
282b2(mdo 'grel): cag min/ /'dir ni phyogs rnams rgya cher grags pa'i tshogs ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po'i rigs su gyur par khyod kyis mi shes sam/ /gang gis nor gyis snying po nges par bltas nas ni/ /nor bdag ming yang ji bzhin don dang ldan pa yi/ /rga bas
282b3(mdo 'grel): gzir cing 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /dub cing yid 'byung zhum pa'i 'jigs spang phyir/ /lha yi mgon po gnas skabs 'dir zhugs kyis/ /dregs pas ma yin byis min mi brtan min/ /bsod nams byed pa rnams la 'tshe ba'i phyir/ /gang phyir
282b4(mdo 'grel): byed? ko bdag cag sdug bsngal byed/ /gnyen dang mdza' bshes 'khor gyi sbyor ba yi/ /dga' bas brgya byin yun ring 'tsho ba gyis/ /rang byas mgo skal ldan pa'i 'bar ba yi/ /gang phyir lha'i bdag por khyod gyur nges/ /gzhan gtsos rgyu yis lha'i
282b5(mdo 'grel): rgyal po yi/ /dam pa'i phun sum tshogs thob mi gyur ro/ /de nas dbang po chen po des de'i tshig gsal zhing tshig gi don sna tshogs ston pa'i tshig rnams kyis lus tshim zhing/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur la dad pas bzhin rab tu dang zhing mdzes
282b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /gzhan yang de rnams kyis bsam ba sad pa'i phyir shin tu sti bstad dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ kye ma ma dang 'dra ba'i sring mo dag /'jig rten dka' thub can dag kyang/ /mgon du bdag ni lta 'dod na/ /ci phyir 'di ltar mchog ster ba//
282b7(mdo 'grel): nga la khyed rnams brtse yang 'gyur/ /de nas bu mo de rnams lhag par yang 'khrugs shing khro ba dang bcas brgya byin la smras pa/ /bde sogs kyis ni bzhin ras la/ /'chags shing 'dzum dang zur mig gis/ /rnam lta'i gnas ni gzhan yin zhing/ /sbyin bya'i mchog
283a1(mdo 'grel): kyang gzhan yin no/ /gal te brgya byin khyod kyis ni/ /mchog rab ster bar nus na ni/ /yul rnams kyi ni sha za ni/ /mi srun de las rgyal bar gyis/ /yang na 'dod pas spang dka' zhing/ /log pa'i rtogs pas chags gyur na/ /rgyun de nyid la rtag
283a2(mdo 'grel): tu gnas/ /gal te nus yod 'di 'drar gyis/ /mig stong ldan khyod mi brtan pa'i/ /'dod la yid ni chags gyur pa/ /khyod ni sbyin bya tha dad na/ /mchog ces pa ni ji ltar smra/ /ji ltar chu bo 'jigs pa yi/ /shugs kyis bdas par gyur pa'i mi/ gzhan
283a3(mdo 'grel): dag bsgral bar bya'o zhes/ /yongs rtogs byed pa'i rmongs pa'i gnas/ /skra rnams bregs par gyur nas ni/ /phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'phang zhing/ /dgon pa yul du 'dod par ni/ /nam zhig de ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ /gnya' shing gang tsam rnam lta zhing/
283a4(mdo 'grel): sa'i lhung bzed lag thogs nas/ /dbyar med khyim nas khyim du ni/ /nam zhig slong mo spyod par gyur/ /rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing/ /nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzab dag /sbyor ba byed cing grong khyer gyis/ /sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur//
283a5(mdo 'grel): rtsa'i/ tshogs las langs nas ni/ /ba mos lci ba'i gas dag dang/ /zas skom ngan ngon tsam gang gis/ /nam zhig lus la chags med 'gyur/ /shing drung ne tso ltar ljang ba'i/ /dur ba 'jam po'i gos can du/ /mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang/ /nam
283a6(mdo 'grel): zhig bdag ni nyal par 'gyur/ /'dar bar 'gyur pa'i lus srog la/ /chu dang rtswa'i zil pa ltar/ /ltos med yun ring goms pa yi/ /bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob/ /nam zhig gi chu ngogs sman ljongs su/ /gnas nas chu ngogs 'byung 'jigs dang/ tshor ba'i 'jig rten gnas 'dra bar/ /yang
283a7(mdo 'grel): dang yang du lta bar 'gyur/ /lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i/ /'jig tshogs lta ba 'byin pa dang/ /srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par/ /bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu /rmi lam smig rgyu sgyu ma sprin/ /dri za'i grong khyer mtshungs par ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i
283b1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dag /nam zhig rtogs par byed par 'gyur/ /ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi/ /re ba'i yid kyi rnam rol pas/ /zang zing bcas shing g.yo ba yi/ /mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan yang/ /log par rtogs
283b2(mdo 'grel): pa skad cig tsam 'ga' zhig /lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyi g.yo/ /g.yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas/ /sems rgya cha ba'i dam pas rnam par spangs/ /ma rig 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing/ /'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul par byed pas na/ /'di ni smad
283b3(mdo 'grel): bya 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sgrul nag dag dang mtshungs/ /gang 'di thog mdza' med nas 'gro ba dang/ /'gro bar 'gyur dang gnas pa'i sems can lus/ /de ni gsod 'joms bsten dang mtshungs pas na/ /sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci
283b4(mdo 'grel): zhig bya/ /lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni/ /phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo pas/ /brdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i/ /'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bsten/ /bai DUr sde ljang skyes pa'i rtsa dang ni/ /me tog rgyas par gyur ba'i shing gi
283b5(mdo 'grel): nags spangs nas/ /lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang/ /glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin/ /mdung rtse lus bskyon grong gi khra yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /gshog pa'i rlung gis rab tu g.yob bar byed gyur la/ /mdza' bo
283b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang g.yo bcas mig gi lta byed par/ /skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa yin/ /byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis/ /rang nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na/ /smig ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun
283b7(mdo 'grel): bdar ba yis/ /rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no/ /brgya byin gzhan yang rnam rgyal khang bar gnas nas ni/ /'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las ni/ /me chen rab 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med par phyin pas/ /gang 'di dug can
284a1(mdo 'grel): yul gyi bde ba bde legs min/ /mtho ris gnas nas 'gro ba ngan pa'i nang 'jug cing/ /skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba/ /gang dag myong 'gyur lha'i 'jig rten mngon dga' ba/ /sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba
284a2(mdo 'grel): myong ma yin/ /gser gyi pad+ma kha khyer dang pa nyal ba dang/ /gang 'dir lha'i khang pa rdzing bur gru la brgal ba dag /'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro dul pa yis/ /gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du lhung bar 'gyur/ /yongs su gyur na dga' bral
284a3(mdo 'grel): rmi lam lta bu yi/ lha rnams bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dod/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sprul gyis lce ltar g.yo bar ni/ /thams cad rtogs pas bdag cag thar la gzhol ba gnas/ /srid 'gro tshang tshing nang na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams//
284a4(mdo 'grel): 'di bde yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste/ /gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces/ /yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang po g.yengs 'gyur te/ /
284a5(mdo 'grel): gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs/ /de yang phrang gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te/ /chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor phyin pa dag dang mtshungs/ /gang phyir bud med ge sar bcas pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab 'dro dang/ /gdu
284a6(mdo 'grel): bu cung zad khrol ba tsandan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis/ /reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse pas 'khyud pas byas pa dang/ /bsil yab rlung gis rgyan phreng gtor bas khyab par gnyid log gyur pa dag /
284a7(mdo 'grel): 'jag? ma'i rtsa mor btsar ba'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni/ /drag pos g.yo ba cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te/ /de bas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten skad cig thang cig g.yo bar shes gyis la/ /phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin
284b1(mdo 'grel): 'dod ? spongs la tsham ba'i zhi la brten par gyis/ /de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan/ /dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing/ /brtson la mngon dga' i sems dang lhan cig gis/ /sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar 'gyur/ /de nas bu mo
284b2(mdo 'grel): de rnams rab byung nyer son cing/ /de nyid don la rnams brtags blo mig dag gyur pas/ /dregs pa'i chu rlabs g.yo zhing 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mtsho chen mdza' med 'khor ba brgal bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig
284b3(mdo 'grel): gcig pa/ /rang bzhin 'gro don rnams byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas ni/ /sems can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par shog /gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtog pa brjod pa/ /slob dpon gsang bas
284b4(mdo 'grel): byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ (//dge slong gi lo dri ba bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ b+hik+Shu bar sha graM prits+tsha/ bod skad du/ dge slong gi dang po'i lo dri ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhan po dgongs su gsol phyag
284b5(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dgung la bde 'am zhes dri/ chag chag dang phyag dar dang/ maN+Dal bgyi /klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ dge ba'i phyogs kyis kun tu spyad pa la chos dang mthun par bgyi/ gaN+De'i dus su brjod par bya ba ni/ mkhan po dgongs su gsol/
284b6(mdo 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gsol lam zhes dri/ klog pa dang/ kha ton bgyi/ cung zhig ngal so zhes zhu/ mkhan po dgongs su gsol/ phyag 'tshal lo'o/ /gdugs la bde 'am zhes dri/ rkang pa dag bkru/ mchis mal 'cha'/ srong dang tho rangs la
284b7(mdo 'grel): mi nyal bar dge ba'i sbyor ba bgyi/ cung zhig ngal bso zhes zhu/ slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgung la bde 'am zhes dri/ chag chag dang/ phyag dar dang/ maN+Dal la sogs pa bgyid/ klog pa dang kha ton bgyid/ bsam
285a1(mdo 'grel): gtan bgyid/ ces zhus/ gaN+De'i dus su ni/ zas la kun tu spyad par bgyid/ zhabs la sku mnye la sogs pa bgyid/ mnyan ba dang bsam pa la sogs pa bgyid ces zhu/ de ni khyod kyi rjes su gnang bas so/ /glo bur du 'ongs
285a2(mdo 'grel): ba la dri zhing lan gdab pa/ lo du lon zhe na/ lo lon pa'am ma lon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod/ dus gang zhe na/ so ga'i dus la sogs pa'o/ /ci tsam thob ce na/ zla ba gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zhag bcu pa la sogs pa'o/ /zas kyi snga
285a3(mdo 'grel): rol lam zas kyi 'og rol ce na/ de bzhin du zas kyi snga rol lam zas kyi 'og rol zhes lan gdab po/ /skyes bu du dang rtsa ba du zhe na/ skyes bu gcig dang rtsa ba gnyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod do/ /mkhan po gang yin zhe na/ don gyi slar
285a4(mdo 'grel): du mtshan nas smos te/ bla ma mkhan po che ge mo zhes bya'o/ /las byed pa'i slob dpon gang zhe na/ slob dpon che ge mo zhes so/ /gsang ste ba ston pa'i slob dpon gang zhe na/ slob dpon che ge mo zhes so/ /dus du yod ce na lnga'o/ /lnga po dag gang zhe na/
285a5(mdo 'grel): rgun dang/ sog dang/ dbyar dang/ dbyar thung du dang/ dbyar ring po zhes bya ba'o/ /de la rgun gyi dus tshong ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba bzhi'o/ /bzhi po dag gang zhe na/ rgun zla ra ba dang/ rgun zla 'bring po dang/ rgun zla tha chung dang/ dpyid zla ra ba zhes so/ /so ga'i
285a6(mdo 'grel): dus tshod ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba bzhi'o/ /dpyid zla 'bring po dang/ dpyid zla tha chung dang/ dbyar zla ra ba dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po dag go/ dbyar gyis dus ji tsam zhe na/ zla ba gcig ste/ dbyar zla tha chung ngo/ /dbyar thung du'i dus ji tsam zhe na/ nyin
285a7(mdo 'grel): zhag gcig ste/ nyin zhag gcig po gang yin zhe na/ ston zla ra ba tshes gcig gi nyin zhag go/ dbyar ring po'i tshad ji tsam zhe na/ nyin zhag de nyid ma tshang ba'i zla ba gsum mo/ /zla ba gsum po dag gang yin zhe na/ ston zla ra ba dang/
285b1(mdo 'grel): ston zla 'bring po dang/ ston zla tha chung ngo/ /yang smras pa/ zhag gcig ma che ba zla gsum dang/ /bzhi dang de bzhin bzhi po dang/ /zla ba gcig yin zhag gcig yin/ /zhes bya dus kyi lnga por brjod/ /sde pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra
285b2(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// //de'i dbye ba gang zhe na/ 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// //yang sde pa du zhe na/ bzhi'o/ /bzhi po gang dag ce na/ 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba
285b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'phags pa dge 'dun phal chen pa dang/ 'phags pa mang pos bkur pa dang/ 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'o// //de dag la dbye ba du yod ce na/ bco brgyad do/ /bco brgyad po de dag/ ji ltar na bco brgyad du 'gyur zhe na/ 'phags
285b4(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad yod par smra pa'i dbye ba bzhi'o/ /de bstan par bya ste/ 'od srungs zhes byas srung dang/ chos srung ba zhes bya ba dang/ gzhi kun yod par smra ba ste/ lta ba'i bye brag 'ba' zhig gis/ /rgyu yis 'di dag tha dad byas/ /ston pa tha dad yod ma
285b5(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dge 'dun phal chen dbye ba ni/ /drug sde shar gyi ri bo dang/ /de bzhin nub ri zhes bya dang/ /gang gnas zhes bya de las gzhan/ /rnam par phye ste smra ba dang/ /gzhan ni de bzhin btags par smra/ /'jig rten 'das smra zhes bya ba/ /de dag du ni yang
285b6(mdo 'grel): dag smras// //mang pos bskur ba'i bye brag ni/ /rnam pa lngar ni mkhas pas bsgrags/ /gos dmar ba dang srung ba pa/ /ku ru kul+le de las gzhan/ /mang du thos pa zhes bya dang/ /gnas ma bu zhes bya ba'o/ /rgyal byed tshal na gnas
285b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /'jigs med ri la gnas pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang chen la gnas dang/ /gnas brtan dbye ba gsum du 'dod// //shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa ni/ /de ltar bye brag bco brgyad du/ /gyur te 'gro ba'i bla ma de'i/ /sngon
286a1(mdo 'grel): gyi phrin las nyes ba yin// //rten du zhe na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi gang dag ce na/ gos phyag dar khrod la brten pa dang/ zas bsod snyoms la brten pa dang/ gnas mal shing drung la brten pa dang/ sman bskus te bor ba la brten
286a2(mdo 'grel): pa'o// //ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos du zhe na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi po gang dag ce na/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ gzhan gyis nor 'phrog pa dang/ mi'i srog gcod pa dang/ mi'i chos bla mar smra pa'o// //dge sbyong du byed pa'i chos  
286a3(mdo 'grel): du zhe na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi po gang dag yin zhe na/ gshe ba la yang slar mi gshe ba dang/ khros kyang slar mi khro ba dang/ brdeg kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang/ mtshang brus kyang slar mi 'bru ba'o// //ltung ba ris du yod ce na/ lnga ste/ lnga po gang
286a4(mdo 'grel): dag ce na/ phas pham par 'gyur ba'i ris dang/ dge 'dun lhag ma'i ris dang/ ltung byed kyi ris dang/ so sor bshags pa'i ris dang/ bslab pa'i ris zhes bya ba'o/ /de la phas pham par 'gyur ba du yod ce na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi pa gang dag yin
286a5(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ /mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ mi gsod ba dang/ mi'i chos bla ma smra ba'o/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos du yod ce na/ bcu gsum mo/ /bcu gsum po gang dag yin zhe na/ 'byin pa dang/ lus kyis reg pa dang/
286a6(mdo 'grel): 'khrig /tshig smra ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bsngags pa dang/ smyan byed pa dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa dang/ gzhi med pa'i chos kyis smra ba dang/ gzhan gyi cha dang mthun pas rjes su smra ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi
286a7(mdo 'grel): dbyen byed pa dang/ de'i rjes su phyogs su phyogs pa dang khyim sun 'byin pa dang/ bka' blo mi bde bar byed pa'o/ /ltung byed kyi chos du yod ce na/ brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lhag pa'o/ /spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po gang dag yin/ ltung ba 'ba' 
286b1(mdo 'grel): shig dgu bcu ni gang dag yin/ spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po ni/ gos 'chang ba dang/ 'bral ba dang/ zla ba gcig las lhag pa dang/ 'khrur 'jug pa dang/ len pa dang/ slong ba dang/ stod g.yogs smad g.yogs mthar
286b2(mdo 'grel): thug ba las/ lhag pa dang/ ma bstabs pa'i gos kyi rin dang/ so so ba dang/ gos kyi rin bskur ba zhes bya ba'o/ /srin bal dang/ nag po 'ba' shig dang/ cha gnyis dang/ lo drug dang/ gding ba mtho gang ma klan pa dang /
286b3(mdo 'grel): pa la khur ba dang/ bal gyi las dang/ gser dngul len pa dang/ mngon mtshan can dang/ nyo tshong ngo/ /lhung bzed lhag pa 'chang ba dang/ lhung bzed gzhan tshol ba dang/ 'thag pa dang/ 'thag pa bskyed pa dang/ byin 'phrog dang/
286b4(mdo 'grel): brtad pa las byung ba dang/ zhag drug las lhag par 'bral ba dang/ dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyi dang/ bsngos pa gzhan du bsgyur ba dang/ zhag bdun pa zhes bya ba dag go /ltung ba 'ba' zhig dgu bcu gang dag yin zhe na/ brdzun du
286b5(mdo 'grel): smra ba dang/ dge slong gi skyon smra ba dang/ dge slong gi dbyen dang/ las dkrug ba dang/ ston pa dang/ 'don pa dang gnas ngan len brjod pa dang/ mi chos bla ma sgrogs pa dang/ skur pa 'debs pa dang/ bslab pa la khyad du gsod
286b6(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /sa bon 'joms pa dang/ 'phya ba dang/ bsgo ba dang/ mal khri dang/ gding ba dang/ gtsug lag kha nas skrod pa dang/ phyis gnon byed pa dang/ rkang pa dbyung ba'i khri la 'dug pa dang/ srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la
286b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang/ gtsug lag khang zhes bya ba'o/ /ma bskos par ston pa dang/ nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa dang/ zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa dang/ gos sbyin pa dang/ gos byed pa dang/ dge slong ma dang bcas pa'i lam dang/ dge
287a1(mdo 'grel): slong ma dang bcas pa'i chu la 'gro ba dang/ bud med de bstan gcig pa dang/ dge slong ma dang/ gnas gcig pa dang/ dge slong mas nye bar sbyor du bcug pa'i zas so/ /zas yang yang za ba dang/ 'dug gnas
287a2(mdo 'grel): gcig tu lhag par za ba dang/ lhung bzed de gsum las lhag par len pa dang/ stan gcig pa'i zas dang/ spangs pa la stobs pa dang/ 'dus shing za ba dang/ dus ma yin par za ba dang/ sogs 'jog za ba dang/ byin
287a3(mdo 'grel): len ma byas par za ba dang/ bsod pa blangs nas za ba'o/ /yang srog chag yod pa'i chu la spyod pa dang/ nyal po byed par 'dug pa dang der 'greng ba dang/ gcer bu pa la sbyin pa dang/ dmag la lta ba dang/ der zhag gnyis las lhag par
287a4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa dang/ der yang bshams pa dkrugs pa dang/ rdeg pa dang/ gzas pa dang/ dge slong gi ltung ba 'chab pa'o/ /zas gcod pa dang/ me la reg pa dang/ bdun pa phyir len pa dang/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang/ nub gnyis las lhag
287a5(mdo 'grel): par nyams pa dang/ bar chad kyi chos bar du mi gcod ces zer ba dang/ de dang gnas gcig tu nyal ba dang/ dge tshul bsnyil bsdud pa dang/ kha dog ma bsgyur ba dang/ gzhan gyi rin po che la reg pa dang/ khrus yang yang byed pa'o/ /dud 'gro
287a6(mdo 'grel): gsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang/ g.ya' sgog pa dang/ chu la rtse ba dang/ bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba dang/ sdangs par byed pa dang/ sped pa dang/ rdeng med par spyod pa dang/ gzhi med par bsgrub ba dang/ bud med dang 'gron lam du
287a7(mdo 'grel): 'grogs pa'o/ /rkun ma dang 'grogs ma dang/ lo ma tshang bar bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang/ sa rko ba dang/ lhag par bdag gir byed pa dang/ bslab pa ston pa las phyir zlogs pa dang/ nyan nas 'dug pa dang/ mi smra bar 'go pa dang/ ma gus pa dang/
287b1(mdo 'grel): chang 'thung ba dang/ dus ma yin par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /grong rgyu ba dang/ rgyal po'i khyim du nub mo 'gro ba dang/ bslab pa'i gzhi 'don pa na rgod pas gnas pa dang/ khyab ral sgrub pa dang/ khri rkang mthon po byed pa dang/ shing bal bting pa dang/ gding
287b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang g.yon pa dgab ba dang/ dbyer gyi gos ras chen gyi dang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi dag go/ so sor bshags pa'i chos du yod ce na/ bzhi ste/ dge slong ma la bsod snyoms len pa dang/ de zhal lta byed pa la ma bsgo bar za ba
287b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ khyim sdom pas bsdoms pa 'dral ba dang/ dgon pa 'jigs pa dang gnas pa'i zhes bya'o/ /bslab pa'i chos du zhe na/ brgya rtsa bcu gnyis te/ gang dag ce na/ sham thabs la yang rnam bdun te/ kun nas zlum por bgo ba dang/ ha cang rtsengs
287b4(mdo 'grel): pa ma yin pa dang/ ha cang 'jol ba dang/ glang po che'i sna lta bu dang/ ta la'i lo ma lta bu dang/ 'bru'i phur ma lta bu dang/ sprul mgo'i gdengs ka lta bur ma yin par cig car bslab par bya'o/ /de la chos gos la yang rnam pa gsum ste/ chos gos zlum
287b5(mdo 'grel): por bgo ba dang/ ha cang rtsengs pa dang/ 'jol ba ma yin pa'i bgo ba'o/ /shin tu bsdams pa la sogs pa ni lnga ste/ khyim du 'gro ba'i bslab pa'o/ /shin tu bsdams pa dang/ legs par bgos pa dang/ sgra bsgyung ba dang/ mig mi g.yeng ba dang/
287b6(mdo 'grel): gnya' shing gang tsam du blta zhing 'gro ba'o/ /mgo g.yogs pa la sogs pa ni lnga ste/ khyim du 'gro ba'i bslab pa'o/ /mgo mi g.yogs pa dang/ mi brdzi ba dang/ mi gzar ba dang/ gnya'? gong du mi bsnol ba dang lhag par mi bsnol
287b7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /mi mchong ba la sogs pa la lnga yang/ khyim du 'gro ba'i bslab pa ste/ mi mchong ba dang/ mi brkyang ba dang/ tsog pus ma yin pa dang/ brang bas ma yin pa dang/ dkur mi brten pa'o/ lus la sogs pa lnga yang /
288a1(mdo 'grel): khyim du 'gro ba'i bslab ba ste/ lus mi bsgyur ba dang/ lag pa mi kyog pa dang/ bgo mi bsgyur ba dang/ phrag pa mi sprad pa dang/ lag pa mi sbral pa'o/ /'dug par bya ba'i/ stan ni dgu ste/ khyim du 'dug
288a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i bslab pa'o/ /stan la ma bsgo ba dang/ ma brtags pa dang/ ljid kyis mi dbab pa dang/ rkang pa mi bsnol ba dang/ brla mi bsnol ba dang/ long bu mi brtseg pa dang/ rkang pa mi dgug pa dang/ rkang pa mi gdang ba dang/
288a3(mdo 'grel): 'doms mi bstan pa'o/ /byin len bya ba brgyad de/ zas blang ba'i dus kyi bslab pa'o/ /legs par zas blang ba dang/ mu dang mnyam par ma yin pa dang/ tshod ma dang mnyam bar ma yin pa dang/ mthal chags dang/ lhung
288a4(mdo 'grel): bzed la lta ba dang/ ma 'ongs bar lhung bzed mi bzed pa dang/ 'dod pa'i phyir phan tshun mi gdab pa dang/ bza' ba dang bcas pa'i steng du lhung bzed mi bzung bar bya'o/ /zas la legs par phya ba drug ni/ zas za ba'i dus
288a5(mdo 'grel): kyi bslab pa ste/ legs par zas bza' ba dang/ khams ha cang mi che ba dang/ chung ba ma yin pa dang/ ran pa dang/ ma bzas bar kha mi gdang ba dang/ kha kham gyis bkang ste mi smra ba'o/ /tsug tsug la sogs pa lnga yang/
288a6(mdo 'grel): zas za ba'i dus kyi bslab ba ste/ cug cug dang/ lcag lcag dang/ hu hu dang/ phu phu mi bya ba dang/ lce phyung ste zas mi bza' ba'o// //'bru nas tha dad byed pa lnga yang/ zas za ba'i dus kyi bslab pa
288a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'bru nas tha dad du ma yin pa dang/ 'phyas mi gdags pa dang/ khur ba mi spo ba dang/ rkan mi gtogs pa dang kham 'phror mi bcad par zas bza' ba'o/ /lag pa ldag pa la sogs pa lnga yang/ zas za ba'i dus
288b1(mdo 'grel): kyi bslab pa ste/ lag pa mi sdug pa dang/ lhung bzad mi phyogs pa dang/ lag pa mi ldag pa dang/ lhung bzed mi bskyam pa dang/ mchod rten 'dra ba bcom ste mi bza' ba'o// //'phyas la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi ni/ gzhan
288b2(mdo 'grel): gyis sems bsrung ba la sogs pa'i bslab pa ste/ 'phyas kyi bsam pas mi blta ba dang/ lag pa zas dang 'bag pas chu snod la ma bzung ba dang/ zas dang 'bag pas drung na mol mi gtor ba dang/ ma dris par chu zas dang
288b3(mdo 'grel): 'bags pa khyim gzhan du mi dbo? bar bslab par bya'o// //lhung bzed la yang rnam pa bcu ste/ lhung bzed kyi bslab ba ste zas kyi lhag ma lhung bzed kyis mi dor ba dang/ gzhi med par lhung bzed mi gzhag pa
288b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ gang khar ma yin pa dang/ g.yar sar ma yin pa dang/ dkan gzan por lhung bzed mi gzhag pa dang/ 'greng ste mi bkru ba dang/ gad kha dang/ g.yang sa dang/ dkan gzar por ma yin par lhung bzed mi gzhag par
288b5(mdo 'grel): bya/ rgyun las bzlog ste mi bcu bar bslab par bya'o// //'grang bar byed pa la sogs pa lnga ni/ chos bshad pa'i dus kyi brlab pa ste/ min par 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dang/ stan 'thon po la 'dug pa
288b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ mdun du 'gro ba dang/ lam nas 'gro ba la 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ dma' ba la 'dug pa dang/ phyi nas 'gro ba dang/ 'gram nas 'gro ba la chos mi bshad pa'o// //mgo g.yogs pa rnam pa lnga yang /
288b7(mdo 'grel): chos bshad pa'i dus kyis bslab pa ste/ mi na bar mgo g.yogs pa dang/ brjes pa dang/ gzar ba dang/ gnyar bsnol ba dang/ ltag par bsnol ba la chos mi bshad de/ /do ker can la/ sogs pa lnga yang/ dus de'i bslab
289a1(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ min par skra do ker can dang/ zha gyon pa dang/ mgo cod pan can dang/ phreng ba can dang/ dkris pa la chos mi bshad do/ /glang chen la sogs pa bzhin pa lnga yang/ dus de'i bslab pa ste/ glang po che dang/ rta dang khyogs dang/ gzhon pa'i steng na 'dug
289a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mchil lham gyon pa rnams la chos mi bshad do/ /lag na? 'khar ba la sogs drug 'di yang/ de'i dus kyi bslab pa ste/ min bar lag na 'khar ba dang/ gdugs dang/ mtshon cha dang/ ral gri dang/ dgra cha thags pa dang/ go cha gyon pa la chos mi bshad do/ /na ba rnam pa
289a3(mdo 'grel): bzhi rnams te/ min pa'i dus kyi bslab pa'o/ /min par 'greng bas dus kyis bshad ci mi bya chu'i nang du bshang gci dang/ mchil ma dang/ snabs dang/ skyugs pa dang/ rlugs pa mi dor ro/ /rtsa sngon po la de dag mi dor ro/ /gnod pa ma byung bar shing la mi gang las
289a4(mdo 'grel): 'thor mi 'dzeg par bslab par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bslab pa'i gnas nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum lhag pa 'di dag bsrungs shing ma 'das na de'i 'bras bu ni gang/ phan yon ni ci yod/ gang gis ma bsrungs shing 'das pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ni gang yin nyes
289a5(mdo 'grel): dmigs ni ci yod ce na de la gang bsrung ba de ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhan po rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'i tshe 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de la phas pham par 'gyur ba bsrung na/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu gzhan 'phrul dbang
289a6(mdo 'grel): byed kyi lha rnams dang/ skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge 'dun lhag ma bsrungs nas/ lus zhig pa'i 'og tu 'phrul dga' i lha rnams dang/ skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ltung ba spom po bsrungs na lus zhig pa'i 'og tu dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang/
289a7(mdo 'grel): skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /ltung byed bsrung na 'thab bral du skye'o/ /so sor bshigs pa bsrungs pas na sum cu rtsa gsum du'o/ /bslab pa'i chos bsrungs pas ni rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lhar skye'o/ /gal te yang dag par bsten na ni mya ngan las 'das
289b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de dag ma bsrungs pas ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur/ 'gyod pa dang bcas pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /phas pham par 'gyur ba las 'das pas ni/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma'i chos las 'das pas
289b2(mdo 'grel): ni ngu 'bod chen por ro/ /ltung ba spom po las 'das pas ni ngu 'bod du'o/ /ltung byed las 'das pas ni bsdus 'joms su'o/ /so sor bshags pa las 'das pas ni thig nag tu'o/ /bslab pa'i chos las 'das pas ni yang sos su skye'o/ /ma nges ba ni gnyis te/ dben pa skyabs
289b3(mdo 'grel): yod 'dug pa'o/ /rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos du yid ce na/ rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos ni bdun te/ mngon sum dran pa ma myos dang/ /de bzhin gang mang ngo bo nyid/ /rtsa rnams bkram pa lta bu dang/ /khas blang bar yang bya ba'o/ /yid brtan par bya ba du yang ce na/ lnga ste/ lnga gang
289b4(mdo 'grel): dag ce na/ chu tshugs yid brtan pa dang/ bkang ma yid brtan pa dang/ yid ches pas yid brtan pa dang/ dge slong yid brtan pa dang/ dge 'dun yid brtan pa'o/ //yongs su longs spyod pa du zhe na/ bzhi ste/ bzhi po gang dag ce na/ bdag po yongs su longs
289b5(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang/ byin pa yongs su longs spyod pa dang/ rjes su gnang ba yongs su longs spyod pa dang/ skyin po yongs su longs spyod pa dang/ mi spyad pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa'i ni lnga pa'o// //yang smras pa/ mi slob pa ni bdag por bshad/ /slob
289b6(mdo 'grel): pa len pa spyod pa yin/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa ni/ /gzi brjid ldan pas rjes gnang brjod/ /skyin po spyod pa lhag ma ste/ /le los nyams pa'i bdag nyid yin/ gtsug lag khang sogs longs spyod la/ tshul 'chal rnams kyi
289b7(mdo 'grel): spyod pa bkag /gso sbyong du yod/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ dgun zla 'bring po dang/ dpyid zla ra ba dang/ tha chung dang/ dbyar zla 'bring po dang/ ston zla ra ba dang/ tha chung rnams ni/ mar ngo'i gso sbyong ni bcu bzhi pa'o/ /lhag ma rnams
290a1(mdo 'grel): ni bco lnga pa'o/ /dge slong dang po'i lo dri ba rdzogs so// //dpal ra sa'i gtsug lag khang gi /'od mchog dngos grub gtsug lag khang du/ rgya
290a2(mdo 'grel): gar gyi mkhan po dI po ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //shAkya'i
290a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po la na mo//
